page.title: 04THE SALVATION ARMY
page.content: {Coltishall}has a thriving Salvation Army Corps. The Worship of the Corps is open to anyone. At this time Sunday is very busy for the soldiers. A normal Sunday starts at 10 a.m. when there is a Sunday School until 11 a.m. from when the morning service continues until noon. During the summer they hold a meeting on the Common from 3-4 p.m. During the rest of the year they hold it in their hall. Their last meeting of the day is presently at 6:30 - 7:30 p.m. The Sunday School is the only means of reaching the young people. During the week there is an{OVER 60's CLUB,}a {LADIES FELLOWSHIP}once a month and a{ {HOME LEAGUE.}The lieutenant visits shut-ins regularly, he also sells Army magazines to the people in the pubs each week.
